string.name: decks
string.comment: Open the Deck Picker

string.name: card_browser
string.comment: Title of the Card Browser, and button to open it.

string.name: statistics
string.comment: Title of the Statistics page and button to open it.

string.name: settings
string.comment: Title of the Settings page, and button to open it.

string.name: help
string.comment: Title of the help menu and button to open it.

string.name: drawing
string.comment: Menu entry to create a drawing to attach to a card. Also a title.

string.name: send_feedback
string.comment: Menu entry in the \'Help>Support ankidroid\' menu, that opens the web page explaining how to send feedback.

string.name: studyoptions_start
string.comment: Title of the Reviewer activity. Also the button to open it.

string.name: expand
string.comment: In the deck picker: accessibility label of the buttons that display the subdecks of a deck.

string.name: collapse
string.comment: In the deck picker: accessibility label of the buttons that hide the subdecks of a deck.

string.name: menu_import
string.comment: Title of the import page and the button to open it.

string.name: no_cards_placeholder_title
string.comment: Text shown the first time AnkiDroid is opened, to explain to the user why they can\'t yet review.

string.name: no_cards_placeholder_description
string.comment: Text shown the first time AnkiDroid is opened, to explain what should be their first action.

resources.string: Ajoutez de nouvelles cartes\nen utilisant l\'icône +

plurals.name: reviewer_window_title
plurals.comment: Header of the reviewer, telling the users how many minutes remains before they have seen all cards.

plurals.name: reviewer_window_title_hours_new
plurals.comment: Header of the reviewer, telling the users how many minutes remains before they have seen all cards. The second parameter is the number of minutes.

plurals.name: reviewer_window_title_days_new
plurals.comment: Header of the reviewer, telling the users how many minutes remains before they have seen all cards. The second parameter is the number of hours.

string.name: type_answer_hint
string.comment: In the reviewer. When the user use note type with hint. It\'s the default content of the text field in which the user is invited to type their answer. It disappears as soon as the user start to type.

string.name: show_answer
string.comment: When displaying the question side of a card. This is the label of a button that display the answer side.

string.name: hide_answer
string.comment: In the previewer, when the answer side is displayed. This is the label of the button that sends back to the question side.

string.name: ease_button_again
string.comment: In the reviewer, in the answer side. Label of the button that request the card to be shown again soon.

string.name: ease_button_hard
string.comment: In the reviewer, in the answer side. Label of the button that used by the user to state finding the correct answer was hard.

string.name: ease_button_good
string.comment: In the reviewer, in the answer side. Label of the button that used by the user to state their answer was good.

string.name: ease_button_easy
string.comment: In the reviewer, in the answer side. Label of the button that used by the user to state that finding the answer to the question was easy.

string.name: show_answer_hint_long_press
string.comment: In the reviewer, hint is shown when touching the show answer button and the user has the long-press accessibility setting enabled

string.name: undo
string.comment: When tapping on this text, the last action is undone.

string.name: redo
string.comment: Menu entry that allows to redo action that was just undone.

string.name: undo_action_whiteboard_last_stroke
string.comment: One of the display patterns of \'Undo\' item on the action menu in the Study Screen. It is shown as the title of the item when the whiteboard (handwriting) feature is enabled and visible and has any strokes (handwritten lines)

string.name: edit_deck_description
string.comment: edit the deck description

string.name: menu_add
string.comment: A generic add button. Please inform us if you need more specific strings

string.name: menu_my_account
string.comment: Label of the window in which the user should enter their account. This text can\'t be found in AnkiDroid directly.

resources.string: Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cette note et toutes ses cartes ?\n%s
Veuillez accorder à AnkiDroid la permission « Stockage » pour continuer

string.name: search_deck
string.comment: Deck search for selecting it

resources.string: Félicitations ! Vous avez terminé pour aujourd\'hui.

string.name: studyoptions_congrats_next_due_in
string.comment: The param will be replaced with \'The next card will be ready in X time\'

string.name: button_sync
string.comment: Text of the sync button

resources.string: Annulation…\nCeci peut prendre un certain temps.
Il faut au moins un type de carte.

plurals.name: card_template_editor_confirm_delete
plurals.item: Supprimer le type de carte « %2$s » et son %1$d carte ?
Supprimer le type de carte “%2$s” et ses %1$d cartes ?

resources.string: Impossible de sauvegarder les modifications apportées au modèle de carte : %s
Le type de carte pour la carte actuelle a été supprimé.
Lire et écrire dans la base de données d\'AnkiDroid
accéder aux notes, cartes, types de notes et paquets actuels, mais aussi en créer de nouveaux

string.name: card_browser_context_menu
string.comment: The value which appears in the system context menu. Note the casing difference

resources.string: Les collections ne peuvent pas être combinées.\nQuelle collection voulez-vous garder ?

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_local_new
string.comment: Select AnkiDroid files to keep while syncing

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_remote_new
string.comment: Select AnkiWeb files to keep while syncing

resources.string: Remplacer votre collection sur AnkiDroid par votre collection depuis AnkiWeb ?
Remplacer votre collection sur AnkiWeb par votre collection d\'AnkiDroid ?
Impossible d\'éditer ou de créer le fichier %s

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall
string.comment: Dialog title if AnkiDroid can\'t access the collection once the app is installed

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall_summary
string.comment: the parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Nous ne pouvons pas accéder à votre collection après la désinstallation d'AnkiDroid, en raison d'une modification de la politique du Play Store

Vos données sont conservées et peuvent être restaurées. Elles se trouvent à
%s

Sélectionnez une option ci-dessous pour les restaurer :

string.name: directory_revoked_after_inactivity
string.comment: the first parameter is WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE the second parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Android a supprimé la permission %1$s d'AnkiDroid en raison de l'inactivité de l'application.

Vos données sont intactes et peuvent être restaurées. Elles se trouvent ici :
%2$s

Sélectionnez une option pour les restaurer :
Restaurer à partir de la sauvegarde .colpkg (avancé)
La nouvelle collection sera supprimée de votre appareil en cas de désinstallation de l\'appli
AnkiDroid a besoin de certaines autorisations pour fonctionner

string.name: permissions_screen_optional_headline
string.comment: Explains that there are optional permissions that can be granted to AnkiDroid.

resources.string: AnkiDroid fonctionne mieux avec ces autorisations
Enregistre votre collection dans un endroit sûr qui ne sera pas supprimé si l\'application est désinstallée

string.name: all_files_access_title
string.comment: Name of the “All files access” permission from Android 10 and after. See [android.permission.MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE] on https://developer.android.com/training/data-storage/manage-all-files for context.

string.name: microphone
string.comment: Title of the microphone permission in the permissions explanation screen.

string.name: microphone_permission_explanation
string.comment: Description explaining why AnkiDroid needs the microphone permission, shown on the permissions explanation screen.

resources.string: Permet d\'ajouter des sons aux cartes et d\'activer la relecture de voix pendant les révisions

string.name: notifications_permission_explanation
string.comment: Description explaining why AnkiDroid needs the notification permission.

resources.string: Active la synchronisation des médias en arrière-plan et permet de créer des rappels de révision

string.name: heading_required_permissions
string.comment: Heading for the section of required permissions that the app needs to function, shown in the permissions explanation screen.

string.name: heading_optional_permissions
string.comment: Heading for the section of optional permissions that the app needs to function, shown in the permissions explanation screen.

string.name: manually_grant_permissions
string.comment: Pop-up message that is shown to the user when they want to grant an app permission that must be granted via the OS settings screen.

resources.string: Cette autorisation doit être accordée manuellement depuis les Paramètres

string.name: revoke_permissions
string.comment: Pop-up message that is shown to the user when they are revoking an app permission.

resources.string: Cette autorisation doit être révoquée manuellement depuis les Paramètres

string.name: remove_account
string.comment: open a website to start the deletion of an AnkiWeb account

string.name: instant_card
string.comment: Used in the Android system context menu/share dialog to quickly create a note. This does not need to be translated literally, translate the concept of quickly adding a Cloze note with a popup.
